items.title: Expense Tracking
items.description: Allow users to log and categorize expenses manually or via bank integration.
acceptance_criteria: User can add an expense with amount, category, and date
User can view a list of expenses filtered by date range and category
System can import transactions from linked bank accounts
non_functional: Secure storage of financial data using encryption

items.title: Budget Setting
items.description: Enable users to set monthly budgets per category and track progress.
acceptance_criteria: User can set a budget amount for each expense category
System displays budget usage as a percentage and remaining balance
System alerts user when spending reaches 90% of budget
non_functional: Budget calculations update in under 2 seconds
Notifications delivered within 10 seconds of threshold breach

items.title: AI-driven Savings Tips
items.description: Provide personalized savings recommendations based on spending patterns.
acceptance_criteria: System analyzes past 3 months of expenses to identify saving opportunities
User receives at least one actionable savings tip per week
Tips are relevant to user's top 3 spending categories
non_functional: Model accuracy above 80% for relevance of tips

notes: Assumed that the app will be mobile-first with optional bank integration for automated expense tracking. AI tips are based on historical spending data.
